rows.label: qst202409_msg0001
rows.name: Isn't that Kountess Emulomuel?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0002
rows.name:
Indeed...[ML:Dash ] She matches the
description we were given.

rows.label: qst202409_msg0003
rows.name: But she seems to be enjoying herself...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202409_msg0004
rows.name:
We heard she was kidnapped, but
maybe that's not the case?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0005
rows.name: Okay, let's go check it out!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0006
rows.name:
Right. Let's hear what
she has to say first.

rows.label: qst202409_msg0007
rows.name: Are you Kountess Emulomuel?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0008
rows.name: And who are you?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0009
rows.name:
We were asked by an acquaintance of
yours to come and rescue you...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202409_msg0010
rows.name: Rescue me?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0011
rows.name:
But you don't look like
you've been kidnapped. Can
you explain the situation?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0012
rows.name: Well...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202409_msg0013
rows.name: Why am I here again?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0014
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0015
rows.name: You don't remember?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0016
rows.name:
Hey, does anyone here
remember how she got here?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0017
rows.name: Dunno. How was it again?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0018
rows.name: Seems like she's always been here...?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0019
rows.name:
You've got to be kidding me.
Has everyone forgotten?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0027
rows.name: That stone is pretty.

rows.label: qst202409_msg0028
rows.name:
It's a shard of Bellflower
Krystal. My treasure!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0029
rows.name: Wow, that's nice!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0030
rows.name: Hey, Ibuki! Join the conversation!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0020
rows.name:
Um...[ML:Dash ] We solved the problem,
right? Let's go home!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0021
rows.name:
No, no. Our goal is to take the
Kountess back home, remember?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0022
rows.name: Huh? Is that right?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0023
rows.name: I'm going home? Where's my home?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0024
rows.name:
Kountess Emulomuel...[ML:Dash ] Your father
is looking for you. Would you
be willing to come with us?

rows.label: qst202409_msg0025
rows.name:
I have a father...?[ML:Dash ]
Okay! I'll go with you!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0026
rows.name:
Then let's go back to
Torigo with Ibuki!

rows.label: qst202409_msg0031
rows.name: It's the Avaritia Trade Guild...[ML:Dash ]
